title: error when installing. no module 'tools'.
body_html:
Issue description

I have downloaded the files. I have changed the current directory to the folder. when I run python setup.py install it says there is no module named tools.

Code example

Traceback :
File "setup.py", line 143, in
from tools.setup_helpers.env import check_env_flag, check_negative_env_flag
ModuleNotFoundError: No module names 'tools'
body_text:
Issue description
I have downloaded the files. I have changed the current directory to the folder. when I run python setup.py install it says there is no module named tools.

Traceback :

from tools.setup_helpers.env import check_env_flag, check_negative_env_flag

body:
## Issue description

I have downloaded the files. I have changed the current directory to the folder. when I run python setup.py install it says there is no module named tools. 

## Code example

Traceback <most recent call last>:
  File "setup.py", line 143, in <module>
    from tools.setup_helpers.env import check_env_flag, check_negative_env_flag
ModuleNotFoundError: No module names 'tools'
